name: Create an AMP Mobile Site from your WordPress site for Fast, High Converting pages on Mobile
author: FastAMPsites

sections.description: This plug-in creates an AMP mobile site hosted on Amazon hosting on the FastAMPsites.com platform. There is a 1 week free trial that then converts to a paid account starting at $79 a month (up to 10K visitor) to use the FastAMPsites CMS and hosting.
sections.installation:
1. Upload amp-converter.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘AMP Converter’ menu in WordPress
  3. Authorization by the website fastampsites.com
  4. Export selected pages to our server
  5. Publish AMP site on our server
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload amp-converter.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘AMP Converter’ menu in WordPress
  3. Authorization by the website fastampsites.com
  4. Export selected pages to our server
  5. Publish AMP site on our server

Why AMP your website?

fastAMPsites will increase the speed of your website by up to 400%. Faster sites means higher visitor satisfaction and greater ROI from your website marketing efforts. fastAMPsites makes it easy for any business owner to make an AMP mobile version of their website, or create one from scratch using one of our customer templates. Don’t have the time to build your own? Our design team is on standby to create your site for you. Our platform is the easiest and fastest way to AMP your entire domain, or just a couple landing pages. Signup now to start our free trial and see for yourself!

short_description: Paid hosting and CMS access fee starting at $79 a month
description: This plug-in creates an AMP mobile site hosted on Amazon hosting on the FastAMPsites.com platform. There is a 1 week free trial that then converts to a paid account starting at $79 a month (up to 10K visitor) to use the FastAMPsites CMS and hosting.
